text: I just got a new VR headset a couple days ago and I absolutely love it Not just because of the games  even though that is a factor  It is just the best relaxation tool I have ever used  For context  I got an Oculus Quest   The main menu is just so beautiful  I just look around it sometimes  it s absolutely stunning amp x B And also  it has a built in browser  which can play YouTube videos and Pokemon Showdown and stuff like that  which is also great  And the best part is that I can be completely ALONE amp x B A big thing in my life is that I just hate existence  if that makes sense  Not in the suicidal edgy way  but in the way where I just want to be in a peaceful environment with no people  free from responsibilities and with acommodations like wifi and electricity  It would be great but it s just impossible  and I ve pretty much accepted that  But with VR  it s different  I can just be in my own little world with a browser and some games and a couch that I can t see and just relax  Just seperate myself from the world  even if it is only for a couple hours  I love it amp x B If you have an Oculus Quest   or any VR headset with a browser and want to see what I m talking about  sit on the couch  open up the browser and put on YouTube  Open a browser game like Pokemon Showdown if you like that kind of stuff  Just seperate yourself from the world  It s amazing    experience

text: i need help  this is my last outleti m tired of trying to force myself to get better  i ve been heavily depressed for the better half of this year  i don t  want  to kill myself but it just seems like my only option left   background  my name is mackenzie  i m   and live near chicago in kind of a nothing town  i live with my shitty stepfather  two stepsiblings  a halfsister  and my emotionally draining mom  my dad lives in the city  he s a good dad but we ve drifted apart just due to distance and our busy lives  i work with kids  and i really like my job  but i work all day every day and it s demanding and exhausting  i have a few good friends  and a boyfriend of a year  i m smart and do well in school  but i don t really have hobbies anymore  unless we count spending too much money on clothes or shoes   re  my life is normal enough  and there isn t really a reason for me to feel this way i ve exhausted every reason in my life to stay  most recently my biggest reason to stay was my boyfriend but i realized that s not a good enough reason anymore  he knows some of how i feel  but he doesn t know quite how bad it is  it really gets to him that i m not happy  but when both of us feel rough we just end up fighting  i love him  but not enough to keep suffering   i had big goals for my future and college but nothing excites me anymore  i have things in my life  but none of it is enough anymore  i just didn t care about anything i think i should end it  i just wanted my reason to be somewhere where it couldn t hurt people   no matter what i do  i always circle back to how empty i feel  i can t be happy anymore  i don t care about anything anymore  there s not a single thing that scares me to leave behind  so what s the point   if you took the time to read this  thank you  and i hope you have a great evening day morning  i hope the reason you find yourself on this page resolves and you find what you re looking for

text: I have tried so hard for you  but you still say I am determined to suffer A short version of my back story is  in third grade depression made its move into my life  Although it wasn t something I noticed until  th grade  Thus I suffered through life  I would go back and forth of wether to ask for help or to die  I made my move at the beginning of sixth grade  Called   broke my family s hearts and went to a mental hospital  All I got from it was anxiety and meds  I stayed on my meds for   months before I wanted to end it all  So I almost did  Took the bottle of meds and them promptly spit them all out in the toilet  My parents were disappointed in me  Took away my freedom and thus therapy began  It did nothing  we never talked about my problems  So once COVID began my parents ended my therapy  Now  waiting for August when I start  th grade  I m ready to end it all  I have done every way of feeling better  Meds  therapy  self harm  attempt suicide  Nothing happened I m only alive for my cat  I m just ready to go
summary: In third grade depression made its way into my life. In sixth grade I went to a mental hospital and therapy didn't help. Now waiting for August when I start th grade, I'm ready to end it all. I'm only alive for my cat.
cleaned: grade depression way life sixth grade go mental hospital therapy not help wait august start grade ready end alive cat

text: I just did something that will anger a few people So I was unloading the dishwasher  I get through the silverware and theres these little pile handle things you use to hold corn  They are colored  so my mind instantly went  ok  these are colored  so they are probably supposed to go together based on color  So like a normal home sapien creature  I randomize which one goes with which  That s right  I consciously told myself that they go together by color  and I mixed them up  Thing is  I didnt do that on accident  I did that on purpose  Why  It was an opportunity  An opportunity not taken is one wasted  You re welcome  perfectionists
